oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-02-22 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 22, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performers Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 959th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb; Rod Brasfield; Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper; Tommy Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ernest Tubb -- The Women Make A Fool Out Of Me (Ernest Tubb) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper -- Diamond Joe (Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Tommy Jackson -- Cripple Creek (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Ernest Tubb introduces special guest Commander C. A. Huffman -- Commander C. A. Huffman thanks Opry staff -- Ernest Tubb talks -- Stand By Me (Ernest Tubb)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Byrd, Billy; Cooper, Wilma Lee, 1921-2011; Cooper, Stoney, 1918-1977
